dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3930 IH: Milk is Indisputably Liked by Kids Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Tiffany (for himself, Mr. Ogles, Mr. Grothman, Mr. Perry, Mr. Fitzgerald, Mr. Banks, Mr. Jackson of Texas, and Mr. Van Orden) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to require schools to offer flavored milk under the school lunch program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Milk is Indisputably Liked by Kids Act of 2023 or the MILK Act of 2023.

section.header: Types of milk offered under the school lunch program
section.text: Section 9(a)(2)(A) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1758(a)(2)(A)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking and at the end;

paragraph.text: by redesignating clause (iii) as clause (iv); and
by inserting after clause (ii) the following:

clause.text: shall offer students flavored milk; and
